job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Retail,Health, Wellness and Fitness,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: Peachy is seeking a Software Engineer to join the team Peachy is a fastgrowing wrinkle prevention brand based in New York City We offer the three scientifically demonstrated ways to prevent and treat facial wrinkles in our studios Its our mission to make wrinkle prevention and treatment approachable but also clinically excellentbrbrWe are looking for a Software Engineer that is excited about building a technology infrastructure to scale with a growing business This opportunity will report directly to our Engineering Lead and will be an instrumental hire to expand our Technology departmentbrbrstrong What Youll Do brstrongulliDevelop test deploy and manage scalable technology applications Peachy studio app photo booth and websiteliliCollaborate with UX designer on front enduser interfaces to deliver endtoend solutionsIdentify business needs contribute to technical strategy and create technology roadmaps and documentationliliDesign frameworks to ingest data from our customer journeyliliImprove existing technology infrastructure and workflow challenges through recommended process improvement solutionsbrbrliulstrong Who You Are brstrongulliBS in Computer
